about_the_game:
This is a free-to-play puzzle-action game where you simultaneously control two adorable slime brothers.

Like a certain famous maker, the game features a stage creation and sharing system, allowing you to browse user-created levels in the "Everyone's Stages" mode.

Each stage in "Everyone's Stages" has its own score ranking, enabling players to compete with others while playing through the levels.

Enjoy guiding the charming fantasy-like slime brothers through deceptively cute yet brutally challenging stages, designed to test your skills in a thrilling "death game" style.

During specific anniversaries or designated time periods, built-in in-game events are automatically activated.
Stay updated on event details via the official developer's SNS or website.

[DX Version Features]

  • Unlocks all event-exclusive gimmicks permanently (excluding Alpha events).

  • Enables access to the "Challenges from Everyone" mode at all times.

  • Removes ads during scene transitions.

[Free Version Features]

  • "Challenges from Everyone" mode is locked.

  • Event-exclusive gimmicks are only available during events.

  • Contains advertisements.

[About Network Usage]

Network communication is only used for in-game content as follows:

  • "Everyone's Stages" Mode:
    ・To retrieve the list of shared stages.
    ・To update and display clear-time rankings after completing a shared stage.

  • Stage Creation Mode:
    ・Used when sharing created stages after a successful test play. This adds the stage to the shared stage list.

  • Notifications & Shop:
    ・To fetch updates from the developers, such as announcements.

  • "Challenges from Everyone" Mode:
    ・To update and display clear-time rankings after completing challenge stages.

  • Advertisements:
    ・Used to display ads, which help support the continued operation of the game.
